reviews.review: The Best game in the world.
Unforgettable all time classic, must-have for CS 1.6 lovers.
Old but gold! This review is useless, this the most recommended game ever!

The maps and weapons are outdated but its still a great game that provides hours of FPS fun.
PRO:
Fun
Addicting
Customizeable (skins models sprays etc.)
CON:
Less noob friendly
simply CS 1.6 on the source engine with beefed up graphics. Even has same weapons and maps as CS 1.6.
Old engine
Some weapons are extreemely unbalanced.
Flashbangs are annoying when being spammed by them.
Ce jeu est vraiment fun ! Un perle. On ne se lasse jamais avec tous les mods disponibles dessus.
This game has stolen my life.
bippity boppity buy this fuckin' game for me. please. In all seriousness, for the time I played it, it was pretty fun. 10/10
I LOVE CS:S and would Highly recommend it to anyone who loves online Shooters and just chastting with people! Beats CoD and BF hands down!
Exelente recomendo esse jogo, muito bom e viciante . . .
Le classique du FPS remis au gout du jour pour les bécanes peu demandeuses, les meilleures recettes se font dans les vieilles marmites c'est bien connu.
I love this game. Played competitive and recomend it to anyone
Glimrende spil, selv om den er gammel er den stadigvæk til at spille på ;)

This game is so good that it's like if you took Counter-Strike, put it in the source engine & removed the shields you have this. Except some competetive people complaining about specifics, but ain't nobody got time for vanilla.
Typically the type of game that will last forever. Most of the content is now user-hosted and provided, which leads to amazing game-modes, maps etc.

Este juego es una pasada.Sus gráficos son bastante buenos para su época.Obviamente el Global Offensive es mejor,pero,este juego siempre se recordará por sus grandes mejoras.Además,siempre te puedes ir al Zombie Mod.10/10.
офигенная игра , в жанре стрелялки . советую всем!!!

Κάποτε ήταν ένα πολύ κάλο παιχνίδι είχε πολύ κάλους ελληνικούς servers 
άλλα έχει φάει την σκόνη του CS:GO
θα σας έλεγα να πάρετε το Global Offesnive είναι ποιο φθηνό και με καλύτερο community
This game is great it shows you most of each guns features but one bad thing is you cant aim unless it has a scope
The controls are a bit tricky, but once you get the hang of it you'll be hooked.
Is SUPER fun. Reccomended to play surf (it is not difficult once you learn it). Creative skins. Not really realistic mainly because the recoil makes a y-shape.
this game in garry's mod = TTT <3
este juego es bestial por los mapas y los modos de juego aseguro meses y mas de juego
Pretty much the best game ever created
Melhor jogo de fps no que diz respeito à jogabilidade.
Einer meiner Lieblingsspiele. Spiele zurzeit den Zombie Mod, echt Empfehlenswert.
if you like hard core team games then counter strike source is for you (not for the weak hearted)

J'ai beau avoir passé les 4900h de jeu, mais je ne m'en lasse pas. Minigames, deathrun, H&S, les wars/gather et compagnie, j'adore ! le style ne vieillit pas, et la communauté sur ce jeu et encore très présente ! surement le meilleur jeu de ma collection.
Игра моего детсва.Все начинали с cs 1.6,но моей первой cs была именно она.Помню как в детстве играли  братом по сети.Хорошие были времена.Всем советую!
Das game is nicht schlecht aber sher viele bugs durch (Updates)

Замечательная игра.
Играю уже с 2007 года на пиратской версии,купил летом и не жалею,очень привык к геймплею этой игры,к этому движку (нетакому уж старому).
+ Мне нравится разнообразие карт и дополнений к ним.
+Графика довольно добротная (на 2004 год)

- Для некоторых *Игровых*компьютеров она не подходит
-Иногда некоторые приевшиеся карты изрядка надоели(такие как : Ацтек,Даст,Даст 2 и д.р)

Впринципе:игра мне довольно нравится ,как командный шутер для слабых пк-отлично подъодит)
Очень нравится!)
I think Counter-Strike: Source is a well Known competitive and open-source game which people can use to thier likings.
why would anyone not buy this asap
Best game ever to get shot by a sniper and get your head stuck in a ceiling
Inferior to the original in nearly every aspect and probably the worst game of all times.

Jogo muito bom e realista!
Recomendo muito mesmo.

I do reccomend this game but play it carefully as i got hacked and someone got me vac banned i hate that after all the hours I put in but it is sady unavoidable and i guess you can get a dumb vac ban removed or pay to get it removed. I sadly can say i now hate the game because there is no no-vac servers and should be provided in case of a vac ban.
Good action game ;) many modifications make this game much more funnier
fun game get it realy good
Когда надоедает дота всегда включаю CSS. А вообще коплю на CS:GO
Läuft natürlich wie auf bei jedem Couter Strike teil absolut flüssig

Очередная CS-ка но по-сравнению с предыдущими  тут очень хорошо подкрутили графон.
Конечно после 1.6 было тяжело и непривычно играть , но современем меня очень затянула эта игруля!
<Советую>
8/10
Nice Game, no comment just a classic
One of the few serious FPS games I can bring myself to play.

A classic. One of the most played games ever. Had and still having a lot of fun playing it.
cs_assault is MY map, hands down.
